mobisocial.musubi.syncadapter

Class ContactOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobisocial.musubi.syncadapter.ContactOperations

  • public class ContactOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for storing data in the platform content providers.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewContact

        public static ContactOperations createNewContact(Context context,
                                 long userId,
                                 java.lang.String accountName,
                                 boolean isSyncOperation,
                                 BatchOperation batchOperation)
        Returns an instance of ContactOperations instance for adding new contact to the platform contacts provider.
        Parameters:
        context - the Authenticator Activity context
        userId - the userId of the sample SyncAdapter user object
        accountName - the username for the SyncAdapter account
        isSyncOperation - are we executing this as part of a sync operation?
        Returns:
        instance of ContactOperations

      • updateExistingContact

        public static ContactOperations updateExistingContact(Context context,
                                      long rawContactId,
                                      boolean isSyncOperation,
                                      BatchOperation batchOperation)
        Returns an instance of ContactOperations for updating existing contact in the platform contacts provider.
        Parameters:
        context - the Authenticator Activity context
        rawContactId - the unique Id of the existing rawContact
        isSyncOperation - are we executing this as part of a sync operation?
        Returns:
        instance of ContactOperations
